entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
